items.name: glistening gem
items.description: A glistening gem. Can be obtained by burning a shiny card.

items.name: fusion crystal
items.description: Allows access to the fusion device in the forge.

items.name: card sleeve
items.description: Protects a card from downgrading. Limited to one use only.

items.name: premium drop
items.description: A premium drop with increased odds. Guarantees uncommon card and higher.

items.name: crown
items.description: This precious golden crown allows you to craft various rare items and cards due to its rare properties.

items.name: backpack upgrade
items.description: Increases the amount of cards you can collect. You can collect infinite cards at level 5 backpack.

items.name: rare card pack
items.description: A rare card pack that comes with 7 total cards. It has guaranteed 2~4 rare cards and uncommons.

items.name: epic card pack
items.description: An epic card pack that comes with 7 total cards. Contains guaranteed 1~2 epic cards, 0~6 rare cards, and uncommons.

items.name: mythic card pack
items.description: A mythic card pack that comes with 5 total cards. Contains a guaranteed mythic card, 1~2 epic cards, and rares.

items.name: legendary card pack
items.description: A legendary card pack that comes with 5 total cards. Contains a guaranteed legendary card, possible mythic card or epic card, and rares.

items.name: exotic card pack
items.description: An exotic card pack that comes with 5 total cards. Contains possible exotic card, 0~2 legendary cards, possible mythic card, and epics.
